attributes.action: Reinstate Colchester Child Assessment and Devolpment Unit (CADU)
attributes.additional_details:
About CADU 
http://www.essexlocaloffer.org.uk/listing/child-assessment-development-unit-cadu/

Autism diagnosis for preschool children and early intervention is badly needed! Reinstate CADU!
attributes.background: On 6th October Colchester CADU was closed with parents left in the dark as to when, or if, these services would resume.  Children under 5 now have no way to access diagnosis or support for conditions such as autism and speech and language issues. Early diagnosis is crucial so please read and sign.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Colchester Child Assessment and Devolpment Unit is the responsibility of Essex County Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

https://cmis.essexcc.gov.uk/Essexcmis5/Petitions.aspx
